name: Sweet Dream Journey Fairy tale
description:
Sometimes in a world of turmoil, you need a little distraction of the mind so let these fairy tales remedy you. The stories about dreams and loves are never-ending. You will find yourself in the world of fairy tales where the imagination is real. Let these stories warm your heart and cheer you up.

“As long as you live, you cannot avoid to make mistakes but… as long as you live, you are allowed to fix those mistakes.”

(Don't you think it is true?)

“Love can come from anywhere and then go to everywhere. No matter who you are, there will be love for you. And now love is in front of you.”

(Don't you wonder who said this message?)

Found these encouraging messages through the stories to embrace your heart and brighten up your day. The stories are for everyone, no matter who you are, the imagination and dream are not limit by age. Along with the wonderful stories, there are adorable jigsaw puzzles which you need to solve to unlock the stories.

If you like my original stories, please review and rate as the encouragement to write more, Thank you.
